bibl.note: This is a letter dated June 30, 1812, from Tennessee Governor Willie Blount to John Cocke, in which Blount makes the momentous announcement that the US has declared war on Britain. Blount instructs Cocke to have his Division prepared for battle.

div.p: The United States on the 18th Instant passed a declaration of war against Britain to day recd. received a copy of it as passed transmitted by the Secy Secretary of State and expect to receive by next mail order from The Secy Secretary War respecting the detachment from the militia some time since orders to be held in readiness — I hope your Division on the detachment from it is ready — in haste
